alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 08 at 8:05PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MDT /3 AM CDT/ WEDNESDAY... The Flood Watch continues for * Portions of Kansas and southwest Nebraska, including the following areas, in Kansas, Cheyenne, Decatur, Gove, Graham, Greeley, Logan, Norton, Rawlins, Sheridan, Sherman, Thomas, Wallace, and Wichita. In southwest Nebraska, Dundy, Hitchcock, and Red Willow. * Until 2 AM MDT /3 AM CDT/ Wednesday * WHEN...Through the remainder of the evening and into tonight. * IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall associated with thunderstorms may result in localized flooding of creeks, streams, and other low- lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Low-water crossings may be flooded. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
